text: Put all of the ingredients into the bowl. It helps to melt the butter, instead of soften it, to mix the sugar up thoroughly into your 'crust'. Stir them together. You don't want to go crazy and turn it into dust. Press into the pie pan using the back of a spoon.  Chill until your pie filling is complete.  Add whatever your pie is going to be. Something like pudding, or a no bake cheesecake, etc.
